description: Lists information about a specific audit report created by calling the CreateCertificateAuthorityAuditReport action. Audit information is created every time the certificate authority (CA) private key is used. The private key is used when you call the IssueCertificate action or the RevokeCertificate action.

parameters.name: CertificateAuthorityArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the private CA. This must be of the form: ``arn:aws:acm-pca:region:account:certificate-authority/12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012 ``.

parameters.name: AuditReportId
parameters.description: The report ID returned by calling the CreateCertificateAuthorityAuditReport action.

nested_items.name: AuditReportStatus
nested_items.description: Specifies whether report creation is in progress, has succeeded, or has failed.

nested_items.name: S3BucketName
nested_items.description: Name of the S3 bucket that contains the report.

nested_items.name: S3Key
nested_items.description: S3 key that uniquely identifies the report file in your S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time at which the report was created.
